description.english: Complete any level in single player.
description.german: Schließe irgendeinen Level im Einzelspieler-Modus ab.
description.french: Terminer n'importe quel niveau en mode un joueur.
description.italian: Completa qualsiasi livello in modalità giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier nivel en el modo para un jugador.
description.schinese: 单个玩家打通所有级别。
description.russian: Завершить одиночную игру на любой сложности.
description.japanese: シングルプレーヤーの任意のレベルをクリアしましょう。
description.polish: Complete any level in single player.
description.czech: Complete any level in single player.
description.bulgarian: Завършете някое ниво от самостоятелния режим.

description.english: Complete the single player campaign.
description.french: Terminer la campagne en mode un joueur.
description.italian: Completa la campagna in modalità giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Completa la campaña para un jugador.
description.schinese: 完成单人战役。
description.russian: Пройти кампанию в режиме одиночной игры.
description.japanese: 一人用キャンペーンを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete the single player campaign.
description.czech: Complete the single player campaign.
description.bulgarian: Завършете кампанията в самостоятелния режим.

description.english: Complete the game in single player on unmodified serious difficulty.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Einzelspieler-Modus ab, ohne den Schwierigkeitsgrad „Serious“ zu ändern.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode un joueur avec le niveau de difficulté difficile.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità giocatore singolo con un livello di difficoltà serio senza modifiche.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en el modo para un jugador con una dificultad no modificada.
description.schinese: 单个玩家在未经修改的高难度上完成通关
description.russian: Пройти одиночную игру на сложности 'Сэм' - без модификаций.
description.japanese: 難易度シリアス、修正なしのシングルプレーヤーで、ゲームを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete the game in single player on unmodified serious difficulty.
description.czech: Complete the game in single player on unmodified serious difficulty.
description.bulgarian: Завършете играта в самостоятелен режим на сериозна трудност без да я модифицирате.

description.english: Complete the game in single player in half the estimated time on each level.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Einzelspieler-Modus in der Hälfte der veranschlagten Zeit in jedem Level ab.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode un joueur dans la moitié du temps estimé pour chaque niveau.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità giocatore singolo in metà del tempo stimato in ciascun livello.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en el modo para un jugador en la mitad del tiempo estimado para cada nivel.
description.schinese: 单个玩家在一半预估时间内打通各个级别。
description.russian: Завершить одиночную игру, тратя на каждый уровень в два раза меньше времени, чем на него отводится.
description.japanese: シングルプレーヤーで、各レベルにある想定時間の半分以内にゲームを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete the game in single player in half the estimated time on each level.
description.czech: Complete the game in single player in half the estimated time on each level.
description.bulgarian: Завършете играта в самостоятелен режим на половината от очакваното време за всяко едно ниво.

description.english: Remove 10 Gnaar eyes.
description.french: Retirer 10 yeux de Gnaar.
description.italian: Rimuovi 10 occhi di Gnaar.
description.spanish: Consigue 10 ojos de Gnaar.
description.schinese: 摘除10个吉娜尔的眼睛。
description.japanese: グナールの目を10個くり抜きましょう。
description.polish: Remove 10 Gnaar eyes.
description.czech: Remove 10 Gnaar eyes.
description.bulgarian: Извадете десет пъти окото на Гнар.

description.english: Rip out 10 Rocketeer hearts.
description.french: Arracher 10 cœurs de Rocketeer.
description.italian: Strappa 10 cuori di Rocketeer.
description.spanish: Arranca 10 corazones de Rocketeer.
description.schinese: 挖出10颗火箭人的心脏。
description.japanese: ロケッティアの心臓を10個抜き取りましょう。
description.polish: Rip out 10 Rocketeer hearts.
description.czech: Rip out 10 Rocketeer hearts.
description.bulgarian: Извадете десет пъти сърцето на Ракетометач.

description.english: Break 10 Soldier necks.
description.french: Casser 10 cous de soldat.
description.italian: Spezza 10 colli di soldato.
description.spanish: Rómpele el cuello a 10 soldados.
description.schinese: 打断10个士兵的脖子。
description.japanese: ソルジャーの首を10本へし折りましょう。
description.polish: Break 10 Soldier necks.
description.czech: Break 10 Soldier necks.
description.bulgarian: Скършете десет пъти врата на войник.

description.english: Tear off 10 Kleer heads.
description.french: Arracher 10 têtes de Kleer.
description.italian: Stacca 10 teste di Kleer.
description.spanish: Arráncale la cabeza a 10 Kleer.
description.schinese: 扯下10个克里尔的脑袋。
description.japanese: クレアの頭を10本もぎ取りましょう。
description.polish: Tear off 10 Kleer heads.
description.czech: Tear off 10 Kleer heads.
description.bulgarian: Откъснете десет пъти главата на Клийр.

description.english: Squash 10 Hatchling spiders.
description.french: Écraser 10 œufs d'araignée.
description.italian: Spiaccica 10 ragnetti.
description.spanish: Aplasta 10 arañas ponedoras.
description.schinese: 压扁10只刚出生的小蜘蛛。
description.japanese: スパイダー幼生体を10匹潰しましょう。
description.polish: Squash 10 Hatchling spiders.
description.czech: Squash 10 Hatchling spiders.
description.bulgarian: Смачкайте десет пъти новоизлюпен паяк.

description.english: Rip 10 Juvenile spiders apart.
description.french: Dépecer 10 jeunes araignées.
description.italian: Fai a pezzi 10 ragni giovani.
description.spanish: Descuartiza 10 arañas jóvenes.
description.schinese: 撕碎10只幼年小蜘蛛。
description.japanese: スパイダー未成体を10匹やっつけましょう。
description.polish: Rip 10 Juvenile spiders apart.
description.czech: Rip 10 Juvenile spiders apart.
description.bulgarian: Смачкайте десет непълнолетни паяка.

displayName.japanese: スコーピオン・スレイヤー

description.english: Break 5 Arachnoid necks.
description.french: Briser le cou de 5 arachnides.
description.italian: Rompi il collo a 5 aracnoidi.
description.spanish: Rómpele el cuello a 10 Aracnoides.
description.schinese: 拧断5只蝎形人脖子。
description.japanese: サソリ型の首を5本へし折りましょう。
description.polish: Break 5 Arachnoid necks.
description.czech: Break 5 Arachnoid necks.
description.bulgarian: Скършете пет пъти врата на Арахноид.

description.english: Rip Scrapjack's head off.
description.french: Arracher la tête de Scrapjack.
description.italian: Stacca la testa del Rocktame.
description.spanish: Arráncale la cabeza a Scrapjack.
description.schinese: 打爆碎片男的脑袋。
description.japanese: スクラップジャックの頭をもぎ取りましょう。
description.polish: Rip Scrapjack's head off.
description.czech: Rip Scrapjack's head off.
description.bulgarian: Изтръгнете главата на Скрапджак.

description.english: Kill the kicked enemy while it is still in the air.
description.german: Töte den hochgekickten Feind während er noch in der Luft ist.
description.french: Tuer l'ennemi touché quand il est encore en l'air.
description.italian: Uccidi il nemico preso a calci mentre si trova ancora in aria.
description.spanish: Mata al enemigo mientras está en el aire.
description.schinese: 当兴奋的敌人还在空中时就消灭它们。
description.russian: Убить подброшенного врага, пока тот все еще в воздухе.
description.japanese: 蹴っ飛ばした敵を、空中で殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill the kicked enemy while it is still in the air.
description.czech: Kill the kicked enemy while it is still in the air.
description.bulgarian: Убийте изританият противник, докато той все още е във въздуха.

description.english: Kill an enemy with a gib torn from another enemy.
description.german: Mache einen Feind mit einem herausgerissenen Teil eines anderen Feindes platt.
description.french: Tuer un ennemi avec les restes d'un autre ennemi.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con un brandello strappato da un altro nemico.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo con una extremidad arrancada a otro enemigo.
description.schinese: 用从其它敌人处缴获的凹形楔消灭敌人。
description.russian: Убить врага куском, оторванным от другого противника.
description.japanese: 別の敵からもぎ取った体の一部で、敵を倒しましょう。
description.polish: Kill an enemy with a gib torn from another enemy.
description.czech: Kill an enemy with a gib torn from another enemy.
description.bulgarian: Убийте враг с част, откъсната от друг такъв.

description.english: Kill 3 enemies in one sprint with the Sledgehammer.
description.german: Töte 3 Feinde bei einem Sprint mit dem Vorschlaghammer.
description.french: Tuer 3 ennemis en un voyage avec une masse.
description.italian: Uccidi 3 nemici in uno scatto con la mazza.
description.spanish: Elimina a 3 enemigos en una carrera con la maza.
description.schinese: 用大锤撞一次消灭3名敌人。
description.russian: Убить кувалдой 3 врагов за одно ускорение.
description.japanese: スレッジハンマーを使って、一振りで3体の敵を殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill 3 enemies in one sprint with the Sledgehammer.
description.czech: Kill 3 enemies in one sprint with the Sledgehammer.
description.bulgarian: Убийте три врага с чука, докато тичате без да спирате.

description.english: Complete the game in single player without manually reloading, aiming or sprinting.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Einzelspieler-Modus ab, ohne manuell nachzuladen, zu zielen oder zu sprinten.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode un joueur sans recharger manuellement, viser ni courir.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità giocatore singolo senza ricaricare, mirare o scattare manualmente.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en el modo para un jugador sin recargar manualmente, apuntando o corriendo.
description.schinese: 单个玩家完成游戏而无须人工重装、瞄准或疾跑。
description.russian: Завершить одиночную игру, не нажимая специальных кнопок, чтобы дозарядиться, прицелиться или ускориться.
description.japanese: マニュアルのリロード、照準、スプリントを使わずに、シングルプレーヤーでゲームを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete the game in single player without manually reloading, aiming or sprinting.
description.czech: Complete the game in single player without manually reloading, aiming or sprinting.
description.bulgarian: Завършете играта в самостоятелен режим без ръчно презареждане, насочване или тичане.

description.english: Kill at least 5 headless kamikazes in one explosion.
description.german: Töte mindestens 5 enthauptete Kamikazes mit einer Explosion.
description.french: Tuer au moins 5 kamikazes sans tête en une explosion.
description.italian: Uccidi almeno 5 kamikaze decapitati con un’esplosione.
description.spanish: Elimina al menos a 5 kamikazes sin cabeza con una explosión.
description.schinese: 一次爆炸至少消灭5名无头敢死队队员。
description.russian: Убить не менее 5 безголовых камикадзе одним взрывом.
description.japanese: 一度の爆発で、首なしカミカゼを5体以上殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill at least 5 headless kamikazes in one explosion.
description.czech: Kill at least 5 headless kamikazes in one explosion.
description.bulgarian: Убийте поне пет обезглавени Камикадзета с една експлозия.

description.english: Perform all possible finishing moves in the game.
description.german: Zeige alle möglichen Tötungshandlungen im Spiel.
description.french: Réaliser tous les coups de grâce possibles dans le jeu.
description.italian: Esegui tutte le mosse finali nel gioco.
description.spanish: Realiza todos los movimientos finales posible en el juego.
description.schinese: 实施所有可能的游戏必杀技。
description.russian: Выполнить все возможные в игре добивающие удары.
description.japanese: ゲームで利用可能なフィニッシュ動作を全部やってみましょう。
description.polish: Perform all possible finishing moves in the game.
description.czech: Perform all possible finishing moves in the game.
description.bulgarian: Извършете всички възможни действия в играта.

description.english: Kill 20 enemies with the Minigun without releasing the trigger.
description.german: Töte 20 Feinde mit der Minigun, ohne den Finger vom Abzug zu nehmen.
description.french: Tuer 20 ennemis avec le minigun dans relâcher la gâchette.
description.italian: Uccidi 20 nemici con il mitragliatore senza rilasciare il grilletto.
description.spanish: Elimina a 20 enemigos con la miniarma sin soltar el gatillo.
description.schinese: 不扣扳机，用迷你枪杀死20名敌人。
description.russian: Убить двадцать врагов миниганом, не отпуская спускового крючка.
description.japanese: ミニガンを使って、トリガーを離すことなく20体の敵を殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill 20 enemies with the Minigun without releasing the trigger.
description.czech: Kill 20 enemies with the Minigun without releasing the trigger.
description.bulgarian: Убийте двадесет врага с XM-214-A Минигън без да пускате спусъка.

description.english: Decipher an Egyptian text.
description.french: Déchiffrer un texte égyptien.
description.italian: Decifra un testo egizio.
description.spanish: Descifra un texto egipcio.
description.schinese: 破译埃及文。
description.japanese: エジプト文書を解読しましょう。
description.polish: Decipher an Egyptian text.
description.czech: Decipher an Egyptian text.
description.bulgarian: Дешифрирайте египетски текст.

displayName.japanese: エジプト学者マスター

description.english: Decipher all Egyptian texts.
description.french: Déchiffrer tous les textes égyptiens.
description.italian: Decifra tutti i testi egizi.
description.spanish: Descifra todos los textos egipcios.
description.schinese: 破译所有埃及文。
description.japanese: エジプト文書を全て解読しましょう。
description.polish: Decipher all Egyptian texts.
description.czech: Decipher all Egyptian texts.
description.bulgarian: Дешифрирай всички египетски текстове.

displayName.japanese: 指名手配、生死を問わず

description.english: Rescue professor Stein. So to say.
description.french: Sauver le professeur Stein… ou pas.
description.italian: Salva il professor Stein. Per così dire.
description.spanish: Rescata al profesor Stein. Por decirlo de algún modo.
description.schinese: 营救斯坦教授。可以这么说。
description.russian: Спасти профессора Штейна. В каком-то смысле.
description.japanese: スタイン博士を助けましょう。いわば、そういうことです。
description.polish: Rescue professor Stein. So to say.
description.czech: Rescue professor Stein. So to say.
description.bulgarian: Спасете професор Щайн. Така да се каже.

displayName.english: Get the hell off my ride!
displayName.japanese: 俺の行く手を阻むんじゃねえ！
displayName.polish: Get the hell off my ride!
displayName.czech: Get the hell off my ride!

description.english: Secure the bird.
description.french: Sécuriser l'hélico.
description.italian: Metti in sicurezza l’aereo.
description.spanish: Asegura el pájaro.
description.schinese: 保护鸟类。
description.japanese: 鳥を守り抜きましょう。
description.polish: Secure the bird.
description.czech: Secure the bird.
description.bulgarian: Обезопасете птицата.

displayName.english: All Your Base Are Belong To Us!
displayName.german: All Your Base Are Belong To Us!
displayName.italian: Tutte le vostre basi ci appartengono!
displayName.spanish: All Your Base Are Belong To Us!
displayName.schinese: 你所有的基地都属于我们了！
displayName.japanese: お前らの基地は全て俺らの手に落ちた！
displayName.polish: All Your Base Are Belong To Us!
displayName.czech: All Your Base Are Belong To Us!
displayName.bulgarian: Всички твои бази принадлежат на нас!

displayName.french: PIl n'y a que des solutions

description.english: Solve the riddle of the Sphynx.
description.french: Résoudre l'énigme du Sphinx
description.italian: Risolvi l’enigma della Sfinge.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma de la esfinge.
description.schinese: 破解斯芬克斯之谜。
description.japanese: スフィンクスの謎かけを解きましょう
description.polish: Solve the riddle of the Sphynx.
description.czech: Solve the riddle of the Sphynx.
description.bulgarian: Разрешете загадката на сфинкса.

description.english: Kill a Witch-Bride of Achriman.
description.french: Tuer une sorcière d'Achriman.
description.italian: Uccidi una sposa-monaca di Achriman.
description.spanish: Mata a una novia bruja de Achriman.
description.schinese: 消灭一个章鱼人的女巫新娘。
description.japanese: アクリマンの堕ちた花嫁を殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill a Witch-Bride of Achriman.
description.czech: Kill a Witch-Bride of Achriman.
description.bulgarian: Убийте Вещицата-булка на Ахриман.

description.english: Power up the Timelock.
description.french: Activer la Porte du Temps.
description.italian: Alimenta il blocco temporale.
description.spanish: Activa el Bloqueo del tiempo.
description.schinese: 为时间锁充电。
description.japanese: タイムクロックをパワーアップさせましょう。
description.polish: Power up the Timelock.
description.czech: Power up the Timelock.
description.bulgarian: Задействайте Времевата ключалка.

displayName.japanese: デトロイト・スチール

displayName.english: The doorman should wear a suit
displayName.french: Le portier devrait porter un costume.
displayName.japanese: ドアマンはスーツを着るべき
displayName.polish: The doorman should wear a suit
displayName.czech: The doorman should wear a suit

description.english: Awake the Guardian of Time.
description.french: Réveiller le Gardien du temps.
description.italian: Sveglia il guardiano del tempo.
description.spanish: Despierta al Guardián del tiempo.
description.schinese: 唤醒时间卫士。
description.japanese: 時の守護者を目覚めさせましょう。
description.polish: Awake the Guardian of Time.
description.czech: Awake the Guardian of Time.
description.bulgarian: Събудете Пазителят на времето.

description.english: Use the Mutilator to surf after a Werebull.
description.german: Benutze den Mutilator, um hinter einem Werbullen her zu surfen.
description.french: Utiliser le mutilateur pour surfer derrière un taureau garou.
description.italian: Usa il Mutilatore per stare dietro al Toro Mutante.
description.spanish: Usa el mutilador para cabalgar tras un hombretoro.
description.schinese: 在一个天狼牛后面用毁损者冲浪。
description.russian: Пронестись за быком-оборотнем с помощью калечащего браслета.
description.japanese: ミューティレータを使ってワーブルの後ろをサーフしましょう。
description.polish: Use the Mutilator to surf after a Werebull.
description.czech: Use the Mutilator to surf after a Werebull.
description.bulgarian: Използвайте сирийската гривна, за да сърфирате след сирийския бик.

description.english: Pierce 5 enemies with one Devastator round.
description.german: Spieße 5 Feinde mit einer Devastator-Ladung auf.
description.french: Transpercer 5 ennemis avec une seule balle de fusil dévastateur.
description.italian: Perfora 5 nemici con una raffica del Devastatore
description.spanish: Ensarta a 5 enemigos con un proyectil devastador.
description.schinese: 一轮破坏者刺穿5名敌人。
description.japanese: デバステーターを使って、一撃で5体の敵を串刺しにしましょう。
description.polish: Pierce 5 enemies with one Devastator round.
description.czech: Pierce 5 enemies with one Devastator round.
description.bulgarian: Нанижете пет врага с един изстрел от АП-24 Унищожител.

description.english: Gib 20 enemies from close range with a shotgun.
description.german: Niete 20 Feinde aus nächster Nähe mit der Schrotflinte um.
description.french: Pulvériser 20 ennemis à courte distance avec un fusil.
description.italian: Fai a brandelli 20 nemici a distanza ravvicinata con un fucile.
description.spanish: Descuartiza a 20 enemigos a poca distancia con una escopeta.
description.schinese: 用猎枪近距离杀死20名敌人。
description.russian: Снять 20 противников дробовиком с близкого расстояния.
description.japanese: ショットガンで至近距離から20体の敵をぶっ飛ばしましょう。
description.polish: Gib 20 enemies from close range with a shotgun.
description.czech: Gib 20 enemies from close range with a shotgun.
description.bulgarian: Разчленете двадесет врага от близо с пушка.

description.english: Kill an enemy using the Mutilator.
description.german: Töte einen Feind mit dem Mutilator.
description.french: Tuer un ennemi avec un mutilateur.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico usando il Mutilatore.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo usando el mutilador.
description.schinese: 用毁损者消灭敌人。
description.russian: Убить противника при помощи калечащего браслета.
description.japanese: ミューティレータを使って敵を殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill an enemy using the Mutilator.
description.czech: Kill an enemy using the Mutilator.
description.bulgarian: Убийте враг, използвайки сирийската гривна.

description.english: Decapitate a Khnum.
description.french: Décapiter un Khnum.
description.italian: Decapita un Khnum.
description.spanish: Decapita un Khnum.
description.schinese: 斩首卡拉姆。
description.japanese: クヌムの首を刎ねましょう。
description.polish: Decapitate a Khnum.
description.czech: Decapitate a Khnum.
description.bulgarian: Обезглавете Хнум.

description.english: Smash 20 Kleers with the Sledgehammer.
description.french: Écraser 20 Kleers avec une masse.
description.italian: Fracassa 20 Kleer con la mazza.
description.spanish: Machaca 20 Kleers con la maza.
description.schinese: 用大锤砸死20个克里尔。
description.japanese: スレッジハンマーを使ってクレアを20体殴り倒しましょう。
description.polish: Smash 20 Kleers with the Sledgehammer.
description.czech: Smash 20 Kleers with the Sledgehammer.
description.bulgarian: Смажете двадесет пъти Клийр с бойния чук.

description.english: Kill at least 3 enemies in one spinning Sledgehammer attack.
description.german: Töte mindestens 3 Feinde durch einen Angriff mit einem schwingenden Vorschlaghammer.
description.french: Tuer au moins 3 ennemis d'un seul coup de masse.
description.italian: Uccidi almeno 3 nemici con un attacco rotante della mazza.
description.spanish: Elimina al menos a 3 enemigos con un ataque giratorio con maza.
description.schinese: 旋转一次大锤至少消灭3名敌人。
description.russian: Убить не менее 3 противников за одно кручение с кувалдой.
description.japanese: スレッジハンマーの回転攻撃により、一振りで3体以上の敵を殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill at least 3 enemies in one spinning Sledgehammer attack.
description.czech: Kill at least 3 enemies in one spinning Sledgehammer attack.
description.bulgarian: Убийте поне три врага с един страничен замах на чука.

description.english: Kill 5 Cave Demons while they're in air.
description.german: Töte 5 Höhlendämonen, während sie in der Luft sind.
description.french: Tuer 5 démons de cave quand ils sont en l'air.
description.italian: Uccidi 5 demoni delle grotte mentre sono in aria.
description.spanish: Elimina a 5 demonios de la cueva mientras están en el aire.
description.schinese: 消灭5个空中洞窟恶魔。
description.russian: Убить 5 пещерных демонов, пока они в воздухе.
description.japanese: 洞窟デーモンを5体以上、空中にいる間に殺しましょう。
description.polish: Kill 5 Cave Demons while they're in air.
description.czech: Kill 5 Cave Demons while they're in air.
description.bulgarian: Убийте пет пещерни демона, докато са във въздуха.

description.english: Blow a Major Biomechanoid into pieces.
description.german: Reiße einen großen Bio-Mechanoiden in Stücke.
description.french: Faire exploser un Biomechanoïde majeur.
description.italian: Fai a pezzi un biomeccanoide maggiore.
description.spanish: Vuela por los aires a un biomecanoide.
description.schinese: 把一个生化人头子炸成碎片。
description.japanese: メジャー・バイオメカノイドを木っ端微塵にぶっ飛ばしましょう。
description.polish: Blow a Major Biomechanoid into pieces.
description.czech: Blow a Major Biomechanoid into pieces.
description.bulgarian: Пръснете главен Биомеханик на парчета.

description.english: Find at least 50 secrets in single player.
description.french: Trouver au moins 50 secrets en mode un joueur.
description.italian: Trova almeno 50 segreti in modalità giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Encuentra 50 secretos como mínimo en el modo para un jugador.
description.schinese: 单个玩家至少发现50个秘密。
description.russian: Найти не менее 50 секретов, играя в одиночной игре.
description.japanese: シングルプレーヤーで50以上のシークレットを見つけましょう。
description.polish: Find at least 50 secrets in single player.
description.czech: Find at least 50 secrets in single player.
description.bulgarian: Открийте поне петдесет тайни в самостоятелния режим.

description.english: Find all secrets in single player.
description.french: Trouver tous les secrets en mode un joueur.
description.italian: Trova tutti i segreti in modalità giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los secretos de modo para un jugador.
description.schinese: 单个玩家发现所有秘密。
description.russian: Найти все секреты в одиночной игре.
description.japanese: シングルプレーヤーでのシークレットを全部見つけましょう。
description.polish: Find all secrets in single player.
description.czech: Find all secrets in single player.
description.bulgarian: Открийте всички тайни в самостоятелния режим.

displayName.japanese: クラシック・コスチューム

description.english: Find Sam's classic outfit
description.french: Trouver la tenue classique de Serious Sam.
description.italian: Trova il completo classico di Sam.
description.spanish: Encuentra la vestimenta clásica de Sam.
description.schinese: 找到萨姆的经典装备
description.japanese: サムのクラシック・コスチュームを見つけましょう。
description.polish: Find Sam's classic outfit
description.czech: Find Sam's classic outfit
description.bulgarian: Открийте класическото облекло на Сам.

description.english: Complete The Guardian of Time in single player on serious difficulty without dying or loading.
description.german: Schließe „Der Wächter der Zeit“ als Einzelspieler im Schwierigkeitsgrad „Serious“ ab, ohne zu sterben oder zu laden.
description.french: Terminer le Gardien du temps en mode un joueur avec le niveau difficile sans mourir ni charger.
description.italian: Completa il guardiano del tempo in modalità giocatore singolo con un livello di difficoltà serio senza morire o caricare.
description.spanish: Completa el nivel Guardián del tiempo en el modo para un jugador en la dificultad Seria sin morir o recargar.
description.schinese: 单个玩家完成高难度'时间守卫者'而不会死亡或装载。
description.russian: При игре в одиночном режиме на сложности 'Сэм' пройти главу 'Страж времени', не умирая и не перезагружаясь.
description.japanese: 復活やリロードを使わず、難易度シリアスのシングルプレーヤーで、「時の守護者」を完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete The Guardian of Time in single player on serious difficulty without dying or loading.
description.czech: Complete The Guardian of Time in single player on serious difficulty without dying or loading.
description.bulgarian: Завършете нивото Пазителят на времето в самостоятелен режим на сериозна трудност без да умирате или зареждате.

description.english: Find the Vista secret.
description.french: Trouver le secret Panorama.
description.italian: Trova la visuale segreta.
description.spanish: Encuentra el secreto Vista.
description.schinese: 找到维斯塔的秘密。
description.japanese: ビスタのシークレットを見つけましょう。
description.polish: Find the Vista secret.
description.czech: Find the Vista secret.
description.bulgarian: Открийте тайния далечен изглед.

description.english: Complete any level in cooperative with at least 2 players.
description.german: Schließe irgendeinen Level im kooperativen Modus mit mindestens 2 Spielern ab.
description.french: Terminer un niveau en coopération avec au moins 2 joueurs.
description.italian: Completa qualsiasi livello in modalità cooperativa con almeno 2 giocatori.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier nivel en el modo cooperativo con 2 jugadores como mínimo.
description.schinese: 至少2名玩家合作完成所有级别。
description.russian: Пройти игру на любом уровне сложности вместе с двумя (и более) другими игроками.
description.japanese: 2人以上の共同作戦で、任意のレベルを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete any level in cooperative with at least 2 players.
description.czech: Complete any level in cooperative with at least 2 players.
description.bulgarian: Завършете някое ниво от кооперативния режим с поне двама играчи.

description.english: Complete the campaign in cooperative with at least 2 players.
description.german: Schließe die Kampagne im kooperativen Modus mit mindestens 2 Spielern ab.
description.french: Terminer la campagne en coopération avec au moins 2 joueurs.
description.italian: Completa la campagna in modalità cooperativa con almeno 2 giocatori.
description.spanish: Completa la campaña en modo Cooperativo con dos jugadores como mínimo.
description.schinese: 至少2名玩家合作打完战役。
description.russian: Пройти две кампании, играя не менее чем с двумя игроками.
description.japanese: 2人以上の共同作戦で、キャンペーンを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete the campaign in cooperative with at least 2 players.
description.czech: Complete the campaign in cooperative with at least 2 players.
description.bulgarian: Завършете кампанията в кооперативен режим с поне двама играчи.

description.english: Complete a Coin-op cooperative game on normal or higher difficulty.
description.german: Schließe ein Coin-op-Koop-Spiel im Schwierigkeitsgrad normal oder schwieriger ab.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Coop Pièces avec le niveau normal ou plus.
description.italian: Completa una partita cooperativa a gettoni in modalità normale o più difficile.
description.spanish: Completa una partida en modo Cooperación de moneda en una dificultad normal o superior.
description.schinese: 完成普通或高难度的自助式合作游戏。
description.russian: Завершить игру в режиме 'Три жизни на всех' на обычном или высоком уровне сложности.
description.japanese: 標準またはそれ以上の難易度で、共同作戦ゲームを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete a Coin-op cooperative game on normal or higher difficulty.
description.czech: Complete a Coin-op cooperative game on normal or higher difficulty.
description.bulgarian: Завършете игра от монетизиран кооперативен режим на нормална или по-висока трудност.

description.english: Pick up at least 10 extra life items.
description.french: Ramasser au moins 10 objets de vie supplémentaire.
description.italian: Raccogli almeno 10 oggetti salvavita.
description.spanish: Consigue como mínimo 10 objetos de vida extra.
description.schinese: 拾起至少10件额外生活物品。
description.japanese: エキストラのライフアイテムを10個以上拾い集めましょう。
description.polish: Pick up at least 10 extra life items.
description.czech: Pick up at least 10 extra life items.
description.bulgarian: Вземете до десет допълнителни аптечки.

description.english: Pick up 100 gold coins.
description.french: Ramasser 100 pièces d'or.
description.italian: Raccogli 100 monete d’oro.
description.spanish: Consigue 100 monedas de oro.
description.schinese: 拾起100枚金币。
description.japanese: 金貨を100個以上拾い集めましょう。
description.polish: Pick up 100 gold coins.
description.czech: Pick up 100 gold coins.
description.bulgarian: Съберете 100 златни жълтици.

displayName.spanish: Novato en el combate a muerte
displayName.japanese: デスマッチ・ビギナー

description.english: Complete a deathmatch game with at least 1 frag.
description.german: Schließe ein Deathmatch-Spiel mit mindestens 1 Frag ab.
description.french: Terminer un deathmatch avec au moins 1 frag.
description.italian: Completa una partita deathmatch con almeno un frag.
description.spanish: Completa un combate a muerte con 1 fragmentación como mínimo.
description.schinese: 至少射击一次完成决斗游戏。
description.russian: Завершить игру в режиме 'Бой насмерть', убив не менее 1 игрока-противника.
description.japanese: 敵を一人以上倒し、デスマッチゲームを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete a deathmatch game with at least 1 frag.
description.czech: Complete a deathmatch game with at least 1 frag.
description.bulgarian: Завършете игра в режим Смъртоносен мач с поне едно убийство.

displayName.japanese: デスマッチ・マスター

description.english: Win 10 deathmatch games.
description.french: Gagner 10 deathmatches.
description.italian: Vinci 10 partite deathmatch.
description.spanish: Gana 10 combates a muerte.
description.schinese: 打赢10场决斗游戏。
description.japanese: デスマッチゲームに10回以上勝利しましょう。
description.polish: Win 10 deathmatch games.
description.czech: Win 10 deathmatch games.
description.bulgarian: Спечелете десет игри в режим Смъртоносен мач.

description.english: Win a versus match.
description.french: Gagner une partie versus.
description.italian: Vinci una partita scontro.
description.spanish: Gana un combate uno contra uno.
description.schinese: 打赢对抗赛。
description.japanese: 対戦ゲームに勝利しましょう。
description.polish: Win a versus match.
description.czech: Win a versus match.
description.bulgarian: Спечелете в мач срещу друг играч/отбор.

description.english: Frag 20 players with the Sledgehammer.
description.german: Füge 20 Spielern mit dem Vorschlaghammer einen Frag zu.
description.french: Pulvériser 20 joueurs avec une masse.
description.italian: Uccidi 20 giocatori con la mazza.
description.spanish: Descuartiza a 20 jugadores con la maza.
description.schinese: 用大锤消灭20个玩家。
description.japanese: スレッジハンマーでプレーヤーを20人以上倒しましょう。
description.polish: Frag 20 players with the Sledgehammer.
description.czech: Frag 20 players with the Sledgehammer.
description.bulgarian: Убийте двадесет играча с бойния чук.

description.english: Complete a Beast Hunt match
description.german: Schließe ein Jagd auf die Bestie-Spiel ab.
description.french: Terminer une partie Chasse à courre
description.italian: Completa una partita di caccia alle bestie.
description.spanish: Completa una partida de Cazador de bestias.
description.schinese: 完成狩猎比赛
description.russian: Завершить матч в режиме 'Охотник на зверя'.
description.japanese: ビーストハンターゲームを完了しましょう。
description.polish: Complete a Beast Hunt match
description.czech: Complete a Beast Hunt match
description.bulgarian: Завършете мач от режим Лов на зверове.

description.english: Score a total of 10 points in CTF matches.
description.french: Obtenir un total de 10 points dans les parties CTF.
description.italian: Realizza un punteggio complessivo di 10 punti nelle partite di ruba la bandiera.
description.spanish: Consigue un total de 10 puntos en partidas de Captura la bandera.
description.schinese: 夺旗模式比赛总得分10分。
description.japanese: CTFマッチで合計点を10点以上獲得しましょう。
description.polish: Score a total of 10 points in CTF matches.
description.czech: Score a total of 10 points in CTF matches.
description.bulgarian: Отбележете общо десет точки в мачове от режим Превземане на флага.

displayName.japanese: インスタント・キラー

description.english: Make at least 3 kills in one Instant Kill match.
description.german: Erziele mindestens 3 Abschüsse in einem Instant Kill-Spiel.
description.french: Faire au moins 3 victimes lors des parties Mort instantanée.
description.italian: Fai almeno 3 vittime in una partita di uccisione istantanea.
description.spanish: Consigue como mínimo 3 muertes en una partida de Muerte instantánea.
description.schinese: 一场秒杀比赛至少消灭3个敌人。
description.russian: Убить не менее 3 врагов за игру в режиме 'Мгновенная смерть'.
description.japanese: インスタント・キルのゲームで、一試合に3人以上のキルを達成しましょう。
description.polish: Make at least 3 kills in one Instant Kill match.
description.czech: Make at least 3 kills in one Instant Kill match.
description.bulgarian: Направете поне три убийства в един мач от режим Незабавно убийство.

description.english: Win one round in Last Man Standing game with at least 4 players.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde in einem Last Man Standing-Spiel mit mindestens 4 Spielern.
description.french: Gagner un tour dans une partie Dernier homme avec au moins 4 joueurs.
description.italian: Vinci un turno in una partita dell’ultimo uomo rimasto con almeno 4 giocatori.
description.spanish: Gana una ronda de una partida de Último hombre en pie con 4 jugadores como mínimo.
description.schinese: 和至少4位玩家在最后一名幸存者游戏中获胜一轮。
description.russian: Победить в одном раунде в режиме 'Последний герой', играя против 4 и более игроков.
description.japanese: 4人以上が参加する「最後に残った一人」のゲームで、1ラウンド勝利しましょう。
description.polish: Win one round in Last Man Standing game with at least 4 players.
description.czech: Win one round in Last Man Standing game with at least 4 players.
description.bulgarian: Спечелете един рунд в игра от режим Последният оцелял с поне четирима играчи.

displayName.japanese: ヘビー級チャンピオン

description.english: Win one My Burden match with at least 3 players.
description.german: Gewinne ein My Burden-Spiel mit mindestens 3 Spielern.
description.french: Gagner une partie Mon poids avec au moins 3 joueurs.
description.italian: Vinci una partita della modalità Il mio fardello con almeno 3 giocatori.
description.spanish: Gana una partida de Mi castigo con 3 jugadores como mínimo.
description.schinese: 和至少3位玩家一起赢一场“我的负担”比赛。
description.russian: Одержать победу в режиме 'Носильщики', играя в компании с двумя и более игроками.
description.japanese: 3人以上が参加する「背負うべきもの」のゲームで、勝利を収めましょう。
description.polish: Win one My Burden match with at least 3 players.
description.czech: Win one My Burden match with at least 3 players.
description.bulgarian: Спечелете един мач в режим Моят товар с поне трима играчи.

description.english: Earn a medal in Survival.
description.french: Gagner une médaille dans Survivant.
description.italian: Consegui una medaglia in modalità Sopravvivenza.
description.spanish: Consigue una medalla en Superviviente.
description.schinese: 获得生存回合奖牌。
description.russian: Получить любую медаль за игру в режиме 'Выживание'.
description.japanese: サバイバルでメダルを獲得しましょう。
description.polish: Earn a medal in Survival.
description.czech: Earn a medal in Survival.
description.bulgarian: Спечелете медал в режим Оцеляване.

displayName.japanese: ゴールデン・サバイバー

description.english: Earn a gold medal in Survival.
description.french: Gagner une médaille d'or dans Survivant.
description.italian: Consegui una medaglia d’oro in modalità Sopravvivenza.
description.spanish: Consigue una medalla de oro en Superviviente.
description.schinese: 获得生存回合金牌。
description.japanese: サバイバルで金メダルを獲得しましょう。
description.polish: Earn a gold medal in Survival.
description.czech: Earn a gold medal in Survival.
description.bulgarian: Спечелете златен медал в режим Оцеляване.

description.english: Decorate the Christmas tree.
description.french: Décorer l'arbre de Noël.
description.italian: Addobba l'albero di Natale.
description.spanish: Decora el árbol de navidad.
description.schinese: 装饰圣诞树
description.japanese: クリスマスツリーを飾ります
description.bulgarian: Украсете коледната елха.

description.english: Complete the Jewel of The Nile single player campaign.
description.german: Schließe die Einzelspieler-Kampagne von Das Juwel vom Nil ab.
description.french: Terminez la campagne solo Joyau du Nil.
description.italian: Completa la campagna Gioiello del Nilo in modalità giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Completa la campaña para un jugador de La Joya del Nilo.
description.schinese: 在单人模式中完成尼罗河的珍宝。
description.japanese: 「ナイルの宝石」ソロ・キャンペーンを完了しましょう。
description.bulgarian: Завършете кампанията Перлата на Нил в самостоятелен режим.

description.english: Decorate the Christmas tree on each level to unlock Rodolfo player model.
